mapper.select: select apseq, mseq, fgseq, aseq, year, pdivision, pcode, apname, apphone, apemail, apbirth, apcancel,apdivision,awinner from apply

select apseq, mseq, fgseq, aseq, year, pdivision, pcode, apname, apphone, apemail, apbirth, apcancel, apdivision,awinner from apply where mseq=#{mseq} and apdivision != '농장' and apcancel='N' and year=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')
mapper.insert: insert into document(dseq, apseq, mseq, dname, dregdate, docureturn, dfilename,dfilesize,dfilepath) values(document_seq.nextval, #{apseq},#{mseq},#{dfileName},sysdate,'N',#{dfileName},#{dfileSize},#{dfilePath})

insert into apply(apseq,fgseq, mseq, year, awinner, apname, apphone, apemail, apbirth, apdate, apcancel, apdivision) values(apply_seq.nextval,#{fgseq},#{mseq},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'N',#{apname},#{apphone},#{apemail}, to_date(#{apbirth},'yy/mm/dd'),sysdate,'N',#{apdivision})
mapper.update: update apply set pdivision=1, pcode='입금확인' where apseq=#{apseq}
mapper.select: select fgdivision from farm_garden group by fgdivision
select fgdetaildiv from farm_garden where fgdivision=#{fgDivision} group by fgdetaildiv
select fglocation from farm_garden where fgdetaildiv=#{fgDetailDiv} group by fglocation
select fgname from farm_garden where fgDivision=#{fgDivision} and fgDetailDiv=#{fgDetailDiv} and fgLocation=#{fgLocation} group by fgname

select fgseq, fgdivision, fgdetaildiv, fglocation, fgname, fgmanager, fgaddress, fgphone, fgfeature, fgguide, fgcol, fgrow, fgtotalarea, fglatitude, fglongitude, fgdelete from farm_garden where fgseq = #{fgseq}
select * from member where mseq = #{mseq} and mwithdraw='N'
select count(*) from apply where mseq=#{mseq} and apdivision != '농장' and (apcancel='N' or apcancel='n')
mapper.update: update document set docureturn='NN' where apseq=#{apseq} and docureturn = 'Y'
mapper.select: select count(*) from document where apseq=#{apseq} and docureturn = 'Y'
mapper.update: update apply set apcancel='Y' where apseq=#{apseq}
mapper.select: select memail from member where mmailreceive='Y' and memail != '1@1.com'
